ygData.subject: Lizard Man
ygData.msgSnippet: I really hope they are evil and xenophobic like the lizards in CT.  They worship and evil god but hate EVERYONE.  Im sure its a racial since all the races of
ygData.messageBody:
I really hope they are evil and xenophobic like the lizards in CT. They
worship and evil god but hate EVERYONE. Im sure its a racial since all the
races of norrath with maybe the exception of trolls are demi-humans (they
all look like modified humans). I also think it would be cool if they had a
bank for them in Cazic Thule or some such.

To make up for them being super-evil (i.e. not even dark races like them)
give them awesome attributes.

IMHO.

But they do sound pretty cool.

And hey, whats wrong with Diablo2? Im looking forward to it. Im in a
dilemma at the moment EQ or Aliens vs. Predator, decisions, decisions.
sigh, I miss the days of being able to FINISH games.

Ahhh who am I kidding, I love MRPG :)
